content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. All attempts to craft or position a Lab—intended to support the supply of Automation Science Packs for research—have failed due to missing inventory items and insufficient sub-ingredients. Although existing furnaces were referenced for smelting operations, no production facility structure was newly established.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage for Entity Retrieval:
  - Verify the correct signature for get_entities. An incorrect use of a keyword argument (‘radius’) and later passing positional arguments both caused TypeErrors.
  
• Structure Placement:
  - Confirm that the required item (e.g., Lab) is present in the inventory before attempting placement.
  
• Handling Iterable Results:
  - Check that returned values are not None before iterating over them to avoid iteration errors.
  
• Crafting and Resource Dependencies:
  - Ensure that all sub-ingredients for a complex item (such as a Lab) are available. Shortages in items like iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables have led to crafting failures.
  
• Resource Chain Management:
  - Monitor and preemptively process necessary resources so that production chains for sub-ingredients remain uninterrupted and dependencies are met.
